level.heading: Health benefit plan reimbursement.
level.text: All health insurer health benefit plans shall reimburse for newborn hearing screenings conducted under this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-276, see notes following ยง 7-851.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: "(b) Section 4 shall apply to all health benefit plans issued or reissued beginning on the first day of the month 120 days following the effective date of this act."
